If I disable "Enable Project Code" shouldn't this go away?  

![Image](http://i1160.photobucket.com/albums/q487/invegat/designView_zpswjkh36oy.jpg)

[enabling-disabling-design-data-in-visual-studio-2015](http://blog.galasoft.ch/posts/2016/02/enabling-disabling-design-data-in-visual-studio-2015-update-1/)
WorkItem.Summary: Disabling "Enable Project Code" doesn't remove design view

Comments.Message:
Hi,

No, this is not related to Enable project code. This is the debug bar which enables features such as Live property explorer etc. The Enable Project Code setting will only influence what you see in the Visual Studio Designer or in Blend.

Also of note, this is definitely not something related to MVVM Light :)

Laurent
